gronk.name: Gronk
gronk.description: Gronk knows his name is unusual for an elf, but when a talking tree gives you a name, it’s sometimes best to listen. The Mierani Forest in northwestern Varisia is not only a home for many elves, but also many pines and redwoods. By exploring ways to shift his form, Gronk learned to commune with his forest brethren. As he grew older, he found his connection to the trees and creatures of his home wood strengthening. When his friends came to him with  dire warnings and portents, Gronk ventured out into the barren lands on a mission he still refuses to explain.

lini.name: Lini
lini.description: Lini has always had a way with wild creatures. More than once her enclave was threatened by some great beast, yet each time she soothed it and sent it on its way. As an adult, she chose to leave her druidic fellows behind and explore and help protect the wild places of the world. Since then, Lini has collected more than a dozen sticks, one from each of the forests she has visited. These sticks are a road map of her experiences, and each holds a wealth of memories for her

maznar.name: Maznar
maznar.description: Many dwarves think of themselves as keeping to the old ways. Maznar knows better. He was born of the earth, and he will return to the earth when his time among the living ends. When his jeering brothers, full of lust for gold and treasure, banished him from his family home, Maznar wandered the wild places and found solace there. For as long as earth and sky remain, Maznar’s faith will sustain him, and his forest friends will nourish and defend him. He can do no less in return.
